news.title: Visa Targets AI and Stablecoins in Strategic Payments Shift
news.body: During their Q3 2025 earnings call, Visa's CEO announced a major strategic shift towards integrating artificial intelligence and stablecoins into their payment systems. This move is designed to keep Visa at the forefront of the digital payments sector, adapting to changing economic dynamics and ensuring continued market leadership.

news.title: JPMorgan Chase to Issue Apple Credit Card, Replacing Goldman Sachs
news.body: JPMorgan Chase is set to take over as the issuer of the Apple credit card, a move that could significantly enhance the card's features and expand its customer base by combining JPMorgan's financial muscle with Apple's technological expertise. This partnership is poised to reshape the landscape of tech-enhanced financial products.

news.title: PayPal Expands Payment Options with 'Pay with Crypto' Feature
news.body: PayPal has introduced a new feature allowing businesses to accept payments in over 100 cryptocurrencies, signaling a strategic pivot to accommodate the rising demand for crypto transactions in mainstream commerce. This could significantly boost PayPal's position in the digital payments market.

news.title: Revolut Opens Financial Services to Teens, Promoting Early Financial Autonomy
news.body: Revolut is now offering retail accounts to 16-17 year-olds, allowing them to manage finances independently. This initiative not only empowers teens but also sets a new benchmark for financial autonomy in the fintech sector, potentially boosting user engagement and loyalty among this younger demographic.

news.title: FIS and Circle Partner to Enable USDC Transactions for Financial Institutions
news.body: FIS has partnered with stablecoin issuer Circle to facilitate USDC transactions for financial institutions. This collaboration represents a significant move towards integrating digital currencies within traditional banking systems, offering enhanced transactional capabilities and operational efficiencies.
